name: 2lbs. FTO Sunshine Blend
description:
This is my best selling breakfast coffee. Mildly sweet, aromatic and semi-strong. A perfect start to your day. Named lovingly after my daughter the day she was born...
Price includes Two Pounds of fresh roasted coffee

name: 2lbs. Decaf FTO Peru swiss-water
description: THis has become my favorite decaf...roasted up dark and oily..plenty of body and flavor yum...when ya gotta cut back on caffiene, this is the one

name: 2lbs. FTO Black Gold
description: Black Gold is a strong yet flavorful coffee experience. Think Nicaraguan, Peru , Honduras and coupla other tricks up my sleave.Think bold but not chocolately...I made this blend for a friend Brian Wynn who has made me some fine surfboards over the years, this is his favorite, enjoy!

name: 2lbs. FTO Trailor Sailor Blend
description:
You've been to the farmer's markets, you've had the iced coffee, here is the blend you've been drinking straight outta the trailor...dark sumatran,honduran,mexican and a couple other tricks make this the most scrumptious blend to date...makes a great a hot coffee too!!!
as with everything else i do, 100%fair trade organic.
price includes two pounds

name: 2lbs. Premium Blend
description: After a long hiatus, I re-visted the Premium Blend.  Still potent as ever although I smoked out the Kenya to add some more character and cut down the Sumatra's roasting time. I am really pumped on the tweaks and I'm sure you will be too...nice and strong with lots of character

name: 2lbs. Dawn Patrol
description:
I have been waking up surfers for over ten years with this blend, seems silly to change it now...very bold and very strong-it ain't no weak breakfast coffee...I gotta throw a little milk in there myself!
Roasted medium-dark with a hint of oil. Enjoy the old standby of surfers everywhere

name: 2lbs. Fair Trade Organic Nicaraguan
description: Traditionally Nicaraguan has been viewed as a dangerous place. well the only thing dangerous about this coffee is how addicting it is. Available in limited quantities, this coffee is strong, earthy and superb. Try it black if you're bold or with a little steamed cream like myself. I roast this one pretty oily to enhance its inherrent smokiness

name: 2lbs. Espresso
description: I have been working on this blend for a solid decade and it is awesome. Working off my motto "Strong, yet smooth" this coffee delivers just that...rich, dark and delicious. This espresso will change your impression of the bitter, rancid burnt taste of the chain coffee shop...my espresso delivers a crema so thick you could float a bottle cap on it (somebody else's line , but pertinent nevertheless) my pride and joy

name: 2lbs. Fair Trade Organic Guatemalan
description: Earthy smoothness is how I'd best describe this Guatemalan. Ultra-low acidity makes this coffee extremely easy on the stomach and its deliciousness a party to your tastebuds...Great for your french press and absolutely dynamite in the percolator

name: 2lbs. Fair Trade Organic Zicatela Blend
description: Fan favorite blend for sure! Zicatela delivers a medium bodied blend of some of my favorite coffees with a very unique aftertaste. I roast this one up oily but not quite to french roast. Great for drip and cone type brewers and can make a pretty good cup of espresso as well

name: 2lbs. Fairtrade Organic Market Decaf
description:
This is the decaf coffee I sell at farmers markets around the  area. Besides being the best tasting decaf coffee I've ever had, it has been decaffienated by using the swiss-water process so you can avoid all that evil stuff left over from the normal chemical stripping. I roast this up pretty oily to bring out the flavor.
Price includes two pounds

name: 2lbs. Fairtrade Organic High-test Blend
description:
This is the organic version of my old Premium Blend. Dark Roasts mixed with semi-dark beans from the most potent coffee countries on the planet. Not burnt tasting like its charbuckian imposters, this coffee is still smooth and well rounded but delivers  the kick that many coffee lovers crave. If you want strong, yet delicious , this is your coffee.
Price includes two pounds

name: 2lbs. Fairtrade Organic Honduras
description:
My favorite coffee varietal, maybe ever. Whenever someone asks me what's the best coffee I roast, I invariably say Honduras. Super rich, lots of body and a nice balanced acidity. I prefer mine through the french press. Roasted up semi-dark but not french roasted!
Price includes two pounds of coffee

name: 2lbs. Fairtrade Organic Sumatra Mandheling
description:
My old standby...whenever I'm stuck trying to figure out a new coffee blend or variety, I always brew up a pot of this perfect coffee. Strong yet smooth, my motto from day one. Dark, rich with almost zero acidity is pleasing to most every palate. I've been roasting this virtually the same for nearly 14 years. 
Price includes Two pounds of fresh roasted coffee.
